text: Bruce Reitherman (born September 15, 1955) is an American filmmaker and former child actor. Born in Burbank, California, Reitherman is the son of German American Disney animator Wolfgang Reitherman and Janie Marie McMillan and provided the voices of Mowgli in The Jungle Book and Christopher Robin in Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Burbank, California Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Movie directors from California
title: Bruce Reitherman
